2008-09-23

You like the shoes I wear #20 - Robert Forster

The reason that this series died a death was that, for the most part, the music I listen to is of a certain type and that certain type of music is played by sensible people wearing sensible footwear. Let's face it "here's a picture of a sensible chap wearing sensible shoes" doesn't really make for a particularly interesting blog post...anyway...

Here's a picture of a sensible chap wearing sensible shoes.

#21 - Robert Forster wearing the shoes you just know he always wears.
